overview: Sixteen-year-old Jeff is invited by his best friend's family to stay at a huge estate deep in the woods where the legendary director Blake Cadieux lives. Secretly in love with Alyosha, his friend's older sister, Jeff experiences intense emotions during this extraordinary stay where he also becomes a sensitive witness to the sometimes toxic power dynamics of a pack of adults. He wishes he could count on Blake, but the possible mentor turns out to be not the role model he had hoped for.
title: Un grand homme
